downloadTitle: Certificates, authentication, and authorization hybrid flow
downloadDescription: Learn about authentication, authorization, and the role of certificates in a one-way inbound SharePoint hybrid topology. A search solution is used as an example of how a request that originates from SharePoint Online flows through this topology.
detailsSection:
Learn about authentication, authorization, and the role of certificates in a one-way inbound SharePoint hybrid topology.  
A search solution is used as an example of how a request that originates from SharePoint Online flows through this topology.
systemRequirementsSection: • The file is a Microsoft Visio document. Users who do not have Microsoft Visio can view this document through the downloadable Visio Viewer.
installInstructionSection: • Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
